actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Customs Administrative Act of 1938 to prohibit the Secretary of the Treasury from extending the privilege of admission free of duty without entry of their baggage and effects to high officials of the United States Government.

summary.text: Amends the Customs Administrative Act of 1938 to prohibit the Secretary of the Treasury from extending the privilege of admission free of duty without entry of baggage and effects to any officer or employee of the United States under terms other than those under which such privilege is extended to all United States citizens returning from travels abroad.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Customs Administrative Act of 1938 to prohibit the Secretary of the Treasury from extending the privilege of admission free of duty without entry of their baggage and effects to high officials of the United States Government.
